com.inherentgames

Class BB

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application
      • com.inherentgames.BB

  • public class BB
extends Application
    Author:
    Tyler The BB class extends the native Android Application class which is a basis for static variables that can be used throughout the entire application. It also contains an instance of the application context, which makes easy access to the context from any other class.

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate()

      • setImmersiveMode

        public static void setImmersiveMode(View activityView,
                    View decorView)
        setImmersiveMode is a function that sets the newly created 'Immersive Mode' for android devices with an OS version of KitKat or higher. It is helpful for devices that don't have dedicated 'back' and 'home' button locations, and prevents the popup buttons from remaining on screen during game play.
        Parameters:
        activityView - - the current activity
        decorView -
